title: La Buena Mesa de Oscar - Sierra Bayamon
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Puerto Rican, Latin American
description: Second location opened December 2012 serving traditional Puerto Rican and Latin American cuisine with vegan options. Dishes change daily, using ingredients that include plantanos, yukka, potatoes, and various mock-meats. Also offers a variety of rice-and-beans, soy and coconut-based products, and a variety of local desserts like flan, brazo gitano, arroz con dulce, tembleque, cupcakes and more. Has specialty items for sale like desserts, drinks, and other health food items.
